name: Black City
description:
Avoid the skyscrapers of Black City and beat the record.

Choose between two game mode: Endless run or Survival.

- 2 game mode

- 4 levels of difficulty

- 2 player in the same screen

- Results online with Google Play services

guide:

With the view over the player, you just have to dodge skyscrapers.

When the camera goes down, move the device.

If you play the Survival mode, after the change of the view, you can eliminate your enemies with a tap on the screen.

Wait until the enemy is close enough to the player to do it!
